game.title: The Missing Crystal
game.objective: Recover the missing crystal from the Goblin King.
game.description: The Goblin King has stolen the Crystal of Power, and the kingdom is in chaos. You must travel to the Goblin Kingdom and retrieve the crystal.
game.reward: The Crystal of Power and the gratitude of the kingdom.

task.description: The Goblin Kingdom is located in the Dark Forest. You can reach it by following the path east of the town.
The Goblin King is in the Goblin Castle, which is in the center of the Goblin Kingdom.
The Goblin King is a powerful warrior. You will need to be prepared for a tough fight.
The Crystal of Power is in the Goblin King's treasure room.

task.objective: Return the Crystal of Power to King Frederick.
task.description: Return to the town and speak with King Frederick to complete the quest.
